product_details.name: SUP91 Malai Kulfi Protein - Premium Women's Daily Wellness Boost
product_details.description:
• 100% Plant-Based Vegan Protein Formula
• 23g Premium Protein Per Serving
• 13 Complete Servings Per Pack
• Delicious Malai Kulfi Flavor - Indian-Inspired Taste
• Formulated Specifically for Women's Nutritional Needs
• Trusted by Gynecologists
• Zero Added Sugar
• Clean, Minimalist Packaging Design
• Easy-to-Use Resealable Pouch
• Perfect for Active Daily Lifestyle
• Enhanced with Gut-Friendly Ingredients
• Eco-Conscious Packaging
• Complete Amino Acid Profile

banner_details:
The banner is a bold and modern promotion aimed at women, highlighting a plant-based protein product. It features a dark charcoal background with a central white circle framed in green to spotlight the product image (`product_image`). The headline (`heading`) is a large, white, playful font drawing immediate attention, followed by a green subheading (`subheading`) reinforcing the theme and target audience. Above the image, a decorative italic tagline (`tagline`) adds a soft promotional message. A green circular badge in the top right (`discount`) prominently displays a discount offer. Below, key benefit features (`features`) are listed in white bullets. Finally, a bright green rectangular button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`) encourages immediate action.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #1e1e1e (Dark Charcoal)
- Primary Highlight: #25d366 (Vibrant Green)
- Accent Blue: #2d7ea3
- Text: #ffffff (White)
product_color: The product image presents a clean and modern visual aesthetic with a color palette centered around white (#FFFFFF), lime green (#A6CE39), golden yellow (#F6C445), and deep green (#2B5D34). White dominates the package, ensuring a sense of purity and simplicity, while the gradient fusion of lime green and golden yellow in the text and logo provides a fresh, energetic, and health-conscious vibe. The upper corner features a bold green “100% VEGAN” badge, drawing instant attention. Subtle green-yellow speckles add dynamic texture without overwhelming the minimalism. The grey-blue pedestal (#B6C2C6) grounds the setup softly, enhancing product focus. Together, the colors create a vibrant, health-oriented impression.
